message: Let's start with a fair split. Your turn!
I'll take a bigger share this time!
Let's meet in the middle. No need to be greedy!
I'm getting desperate, but I'll still try to get more!
You're not getting any younger, Bob! Time to make a deal!
I'm not going to get any more generous, Alice!
This is my last offer, Bob. Take it or leave it!
I'm not going to give up, Alice! This is my final offer!
Fine, take it all. I'm done.
